group_1.textRight: There probably is a way...
...to stop us from turnin' into Witches.
Isn't that what those Wings of the Magius@chicks said?
They wanna "save us from a curse".
Which means, they probably know of a way@to stop it.
Right now, the people who are closest to@findin' a way to avoid becoming Witches...
Are those guys, right?
If you don't wanna become a Witch, it's@probably fastest to just hunt 'em down.
Maybe that's what Mami was tryin' to do...
Then while she was lookin' for them, they@did somethin' to her.
A "hunter becomes the hunted" kinda deal.
I mean, turnin' into a Witch, that's the@end of the line.
You'll be out there fightin' Magical Girls,@huntin' while bein' hunted...
You might even end up fightin' me, too.

group_1.textLeft: Don't say stuff like that, Kyoko!

group_1.textRight: Either way, I'm not gonna just let myself@turn into a Witch.
I'm not goin' down that easy.
Yeah, I'm gonna try to find a way to avoid@turnin' into a Witch, too.

group_1.textLeft: Then you could join up with us!

group_1.textRight: Nah, I'm doin' this alone.
I wanna take out those Wings of the Magius@by myself.

group_1.textLeft: Hey, hang on! You can't justâ€”

group_1.textRight: If the same thing that happened to Mami@happens to me...
Then...
